title: Black Screen after Champ Select @Riot
body: So I had a couple games in which I had a black screen after champion select. The only way I fixed it was to spam enter, delete and spacebar. But I had it again last night and I couldn't even join game. Can You guys fix it?

replies.body: The black screen you're receiving may be due to a connection issue with your network reaching our game server. As Rineyy suggested, I recommend going over the steps provided in our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to fixed this for good.  If you continue to have any issues or have questions, please let me know!

It's like due to connectivity issues. [Troubleshoot them.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/su16_keyart_1920x1080_0.jpg?itok=6nj8mHjj
But I can browse the internet perfectly while the black screen. It doesn't happen all the time but a few times.
Connectivity to the servers, not generally.
